statements: Holy shit.  Holy shit.  Hohoholy shyeeeit.
Looks like the Groundhog's not the only vessel in trouble.  Every ship in the vicinity appears compromised, both the recently departed and the due-to-arrive.
There's at least one ship physically docked with Punxsutawney Station.  It doesn't appear to be faring better, and may in fact be the source of the problem.
There are two landable celestial bodies in the system: a rocky planet and the moon of a gas giant.
I'll open locations as we come to understand how to access them.  Green means you've been through there.  Gold means you've achieved the optional goals there too.  Good luck.
